      • onError

        public void onError(RtmClient client,
                    java.lang.Exception ex)
        Description copied from interface: RtmClientListener
        Called when an error occurs in the application because of authentication, Protocol Data Unit (PDU) errors, or JSON errors.

        This method is called when one of the following exceptions occurs in the application:

        • AuthException - Authentication error.
        • PduException - Negative or unexpected PDU received from the RTM Service.
        • InvalidJsonException - Incorrect or invalid JSON format received from RTM.

        Specified by:
        onError in interface RtmClientListener
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client
        ex - exception generated by the application
        See Also:
        ConnectionListener.onError()

      • onEnterStopped

        public void onEnterStopped(RtmClient client)
        Description copied from interface: RtmClientListener
        Called when the client enters the stopped state.

        The client enters the stopped state in the following situations:

        • RtmClient created and initialized with stopped state
        • RtmClient.stop() method called explicitly
        • auto-reconnect disabled and connection drops
        Specified by:
        onEnterStopped in interface RtmClientListener
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client

      • onLeaveStopped

        public void onLeaveStopped(RtmClient client)
        Description copied from interface: RtmClientListener
        Called when the client leaves the stopped state.

        The client leaves the state when you call the RtmClient.start() method.

        Specified by:
        onLeaveStopped in interface RtmClientListener
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client

      • onEnterConnecting

        public void onEnterConnecting(RtmClient client)
        Description copied from interface: RtmClientListener
        Called when the client enters the connecting state.

        The client enters this state when it attempts to connect to RTM.

        Specified by:
        onEnterConnecting in interface RtmClientListener
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client

      • onLeaveConnecting

        public void onLeaveConnecting(RtmClient client)
        Description copied from interface: RtmClientListener
        Called when the client leaves the connecting state.

        The client leaves this state when it either successfully connects or fails to connect to RTM.

        Specified by:
        onLeaveConnecting in interface RtmClientListener
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client

      • onEnterConnected

        public void onEnterConnected(RtmClient client)
        Description copied from interface: RtmClientListener
        Called when the client enters the connected state.

        The client enters this state after it has connected and authenticated to RTM and is able to send and receive messages.

        Specified by:
        onEnterConnected in interface RtmClientListener
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client

      • onLeaveConnected

        public void onLeaveConnected(RtmClient client)
        Description copied from interface: RtmClientListener
        Called when the client leaves the connected state.

        The client leaves this state when the connection drops.

        Specified by:
        onLeaveConnected in interface RtmClientListener
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client

      • onEnterAwaiting

        public void onEnterAwaiting(RtmClient client)
        Description copied from interface: RtmClientListener
        Called when the client enters the awaiting state.

        The client enters this state after the connection to RTM fails and auto-reconnect is enabled.

        Specified by:
        onEnterAwaiting in interface RtmClientListener
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client

      • onLeaveAwaiting

        public void onLeaveAwaiting(RtmClient client)
        Description copied from interface: RtmClientListener
        Called when the client leaves the awaiting state.

        The client leaves this state when it enters the connecting state and attempts to reconnect.

        Specified by:
        onLeaveAwaiting in interface RtmClientListener
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client
